entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow or rain mixed with drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
